thread.title: Migos, Chance The Rapper & Justin Bieber To Star In Top Secret DJ Khaled Video
thread.title_full: Migos, Chance The Rapper & Justin Bieber To Star In Top Secret DJ Khaled Video

author: Shaun M
title: Migos, Chance The Rapper & Justin Bieber To Star In Top Secret DJ Khaled Video
text:
Home > Music > Migos, Chance The Rapper & Justin Bieber To Star In Top Secret DJ Khaled Video Migos, Chance The Rapper & Justin Bieber To Star In Top Secret DJ Khaled Video 0 0 3 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 27, 2017 at 05:55pm DJ Khaled revealed he's working with Migos, Chance The Rapper and Justin Bieber on a new music video. 
DJ Khaled struck gold with the recent release of "Shining" by reuniting Beyonce and Jay Z on record. No doubt, he seeks to reiterate his good luck with another collab. 
In a series of video IG posts Monday, the star beatmaker has been dropping hints at a future collaboration track with Migos , Chance The Rapper and Justin Bieber . They were spotted shooting a music video at a mansion lined with palm trees. 
Claiming it's top secret, Khaled unveiled his guest stars one by one: Chance, Migos and finally the Biebz. He even hinted at a fourth star missing from the set. Dubbed an anthem, this collaboration looks like it's going to be all-out flames, a true summer banger. 
Like Beyonce and Jay Z, this partnership is a reunion of styles. Chance and Migos have both worked with Bieber in the past . Khaled's album Grateful drops later this year. A post shared by DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) on Feb 27, 2017 at 12:29pm PST A post shared by DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) on Feb 27, 2017 at 11:37am PST A post shared by DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) on Feb 27, 2017 at 1:10pm PST A post shared by DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) on Feb 27, 2017 at 1:30pm PST A post shared by DJ KHALED (@djkhaled) on Feb 27, 2017 at 1:44pm PST
